1.content: Fix Critical Mock Data Bug in Client Management
1.details: 1. Replace hardcoded mock data in ClientManagement.tsx (lines 243-299). 2. Fix ClientInformationStep.tsx mock client list (lines 77-103). 3. Connect to existing useClients hook for real data. 4. Test client data persistence.

2.details: 1. ✅ FIXED: Applied RLS policies for client creation (HTTP 401 resolved). 2. ✅ FIXED: Fixed activities/user_profiles relationship (HTTP 400 resolved). 3. Build and deploy application with fixes. 4. Test client creation functionality.

3.details: 1. Configure Google Maps API key environment variable. 2. Test autocomplete functionality. 3. Ensure proper API key propagation.

4.details: 1. Resolve database relationship errors. 2. Fix API endpoints returning HTML instead of JSON. 3. Test data loading across all pages.
